Posts.Content:
The radiologist said something in my right breast had changed since last year's mammogram. They're trying to get me in tomorrow for more tests. I'm really scared. I hadn't noticed any issues with my breast. I did have a fibroadenoma about
 15 years ago that was biopsied, and my mom has had a lot of cysts and some callbacks. I hope it's just that, but I'm terrified.
Posts.Title: Got a callback from mammogram yesterday

Posts.Content:
They said everything looked like normal breast tissue after the 2nd mammogram. Didn't even have me do the follow-up sonogram. Whew! Thank you for the reply, barkyboys!
 
Rowasa nightly, Canasa suppository in morning
Taken off Asacol under suspicion it caused low white-cell count
Allergies to dust, molds, penicillin, some trees and grasses, and cats (but I still have three!)
Occasional migraines
Pescetarian (eat fish but no other meat)
Posts.Title: Got a callback from mammogram yesterday
